name: Disable Comment Url
author: Syed Raza Ali

sections.description: This is the Simple Plugin which required no special access or control, Simple install it and it will remove the URL from your Comments Form!
sections.installation:
1. Download and Unzip
  2. Using FTP Upload it to wp-content/plugins
  3. Go to Plugins in Your WordPress Admin and Active it!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download and Unzip
  2. Using FTP Upload it to wp-content/plugins
  3. Go to Plugins in Your WordPress Admin and Active it!

Is there any special requirement for this plugin

No Special requirement, simple install and activate this plugin

Do i need to customize the code of website to make it work

No code work required to make it work on your site!

short_description: Nice and simple plugin help you to remove URL from comment to avoid people to do spam comments by posting their urls to your website
description: This is the Simple Plugin which required no special access or control, Simple install it and it will remove the URL from your Comments Form!
